title: 6 men arrested, juvenile detained for raping minor, extorting money in Rajasthan
selftext: People need to befriend their children. Is it bad parenting or a case of neglection?
comments: All of the accused need to be executed. Rape is to be punishable by death. Then only we might deter such heinous crimes.
And then this people ask why Indian are not respected in foreign countries and are called pajeet. ðŸ¥²
